meanings.sent1: My nuncle always tells the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my nuncle during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: My nuncle is like a walking encyclopedia of family history.
meanings.sent4: To me, my nuncle is a pillar of wisdom and guidance.
meanings.sent5: The image of my nuncle's warm smile is etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for an uncle.
meanings.sent1: Hey there, nuncle! How's your day going?
meanings.sent2: My nuncle always greets me with a big hug.
meanings.sent3: My nuncle is the king of dad jokes in our family.
meanings.sent4: When I need advice, my nuncle is my go-to person.
meanings.sent5: The bond between me and my nuncle is unbreakable.

meanings.definition: A variant of the word uncle.
meanings.sent1: I heard someone use the term nuncle instead of uncle.
meanings.sent2: In some regions, people say nuncle instead of uncle.
meanings.sent3: My little cousin calls our uncle 'nuncle' by mistake.
meanings.sent4: The word nuncle has a quaint and old-fashioned charm to it.
meanings.sent5: Nuncle is a fun word to say, don't you think?
